text: Hi!, any documentation for vue.js integration?

Hi Juan, we currently do not have official documentation for using Vue with HubSpot. We do see how it would be really helpful. In the meantime we have a <#CM9UXHWKH|js-frameworks-in-HubSpot-cms> channel

In there occasionally people post tips and tricks and build processes theyâ€™ve worked out. We love hearing how developers are currently integrating javascript frameworks with HubSpot, as it helps us improve to better support more complex needs.

I hate reaching out because I feel someone else already asked this, but it looks like we can now Add Modules to pages - which is great! But, I'm curious on how I can turn on this functionality for certain templates. I realize this view may still be in beta and not yet have documentation, but would love to hear that it does!
Hey Ryan, is this a blog?
It's not - just a page template. Is this functionality just for blog templates at the moment?
Nope, it's for pages. I'm assuming you have a flex column or drag and drop area in the template?
